inclusion.criterion: Chronic cough lasting more than 8 weeks
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Not treated with angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) inhibitors
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Not treated with inhaled corticosteroids or systemic corticosteroids min. 4 weeks before enrolment
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Not treated with proton pump inhibitors min. 2 weeks before enrolment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Not treated with antihistaminic drugs 1 week before enrolment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: With normal chest radiograph or with insignificant changes in cough pathogenesis
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Without airway infection in previous 6 weeks
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients under 18 years old and above 75 years old
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Smokers (actual or ex-smokers shorter than 6 weeks)
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Therapy with corticosteroids (inhaled or systemic) for last 4 weeks, proton pump inhibitors for 2 weeks, antihistaminic drug for 1 week before enrolment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Airway infection 6 weeks preceding enrolment or during study - re-attempt to enroll after 6 weeks
exclusion.label: met

notes: The patient is a 15-year-old boy with asthma diagnosed a year ago. He presents with shortness of breath, chest tightening and cough.
